description:
Drive Innovation in Social Media Marketing

At Limitless, we're revolutionizing social media marketing with outside the box thinking and next level creativity. We're seeking a dynamic Project Manager to support our core team in delivering exceptional results for our clients. Join us in shaping the next generation of digital marketing!

About Us:

Limitless is a fast-paced, innovative social media marketing agency serving subject matter experts around the nation. Our diverse team, spread across multiple time zones, specializes in video editing, graphic design, copywriting, social media management, digital marketing, ad creation, and operations. We pride ourselves on our collaborative culture, commitment to excellence, and continuous learning environment.

Who We're Looking For:

We're looking for a highly organized and proactive Project Manager to oversee our client projects and work with a team of 10+ talented professionals. You'll manage a diverse portfolio of 200+ monthly projects for 10-15 clients, ranging from video content to large-scale campaigns. The ideal candidate is digital-savvy, an innovative thinker, and adept at implementing and following standard operating procedures.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Oversee the scheduling, coordination, and management of 200+ diverse projects monthly for 10-15 clients
  • Ensure timely completion of all projects within scope and budget
  • Utilize ClickUp for project management and navigate various creative and storage tools
  • Anticipate client and project needs, providing proactive solutions
  • Maintain constant communication with team members via Slack and ClickUp
  • Alert executives of any delays or issues with project completion
  • Leverage AI tools to enhance skills and automate processes
  • Implement and follow existing SOPs, while also contributing to the creation of new SOPs
  • Coordinate and manage the workload of 10+ employees across different time zones
  • Support the development and maintenance of client relationships

Qualifications:

  • 2+ years of experience as a Project Manager in a digital or social media marketing agency
  • Proficiency with ClickUp and familiarity with Adobe Creative Suite
  • Strong organizational and multitasking skills
  • Ability to manage 10-15 client projects concurrently
  • Excellent written and verbal communication skills
  • Proficiency in Slack and remote collaboration tools
  • Strong problem-solving abilities and proactive mindset
  • Experience with or willingness to learn AI tools for skill enhancement and process automation
  • Comfortable working remotely during Pacific Time business hours

Contract Details:

  • Full-time contractor position (1099)
  • Flat monthly rate of $2,000 - $3,000 based on experience
  • Remote work from anywhere in the world

Growth Opportunities: At Limitless, we believe in nurturing talent. As a Project Manager, you'll have the opportunity to grow into senior management roles and take on increasing responsibilities as you develop your skills.

Diversity & Inclusion: Limitless is committed to fostering a diverse and inclusive workplace. We believe that our differences make us stronger and fuel our creativity. We encourage applications from candidates of all backgrounds.
